title: How to unsubscribe from EA Play
description: Learn how to cancel your EA Play subscription on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. Follow these steps to manage your membership and avoid future charges.

steps_1.title: Cancel EA Play Subscription via EA Account
steps_1.description:
To cancel your EA Play subscription through the EA website, follow these steps:

*   Go to your EA Account and sign in.
*   Select the "Subscriptions and Memberships" tab.
*   In the "Your membership" section, select "Cancel membership".
*   Select "Cancel membership" on the new browser page.

steps_2.title: Cancel EA Play Subscription via Xbox
steps_2.description:
To cancel your EA Play subscription through your Xbox console, follow these steps:

*   Press the Xbox button on your controller to open the guide.
*   Go to Profile & system > Settings > Account > Subscriptions.
*   Find EA Play in the list and select it.
*   Choose "Cancel Subscription".
